1.title: Be nice to other people
1.content: Having a debate is fine but keep it friendly.

2.title: No self promoting.
2.content: Please. No one wants to see your Call of duty 360 no scope videos

3.title: No Piracy
3.content: This includes anything from Blawar or SX OS.

4.title: Don’t randomly ping people
4.content: Some of us are hard at work or at school. Only ping a mod when there’s someone breaking the rules.

5.title: We loosely follow the Discord TOS
5.content: We won’t ban or kick for the usage of GooseMod or Better Discord but we will kick if we detect that you are younger then 13.

6.title: No NSFW/L
6.content: We do not want any NSFW stuff here. This also applies to custom switch themes.

7.title: No Mini-Modding
7.content: We have chosen the people that we feel should moderate. If someone is breaking a rule, tag an active moderator.

8.title: Chat in the correct channel
8.content: We love having you talk, but make sure it's in the correct channel.
